About.title: About Tan Xuan Commune
About.paragraphOne: Tan Xuan Commune is located near the central area of Hoc Mon District, adjacent to communes in the district, specifically: Northeast borders Hoc Mon Town, borders Thoi Tam Thon commune (the border is To Ky street); Southeast borders Trung Chanh commune (the border is the road connecting Tan Xuan - Trung Chanh communes); Northwest borders Hoc Mon Town (the border is Ba Trieu street); Southwest borders Xuan Thoi Dong commune (the border is National Highway 22)
About.paragraphTwo: After the South was completely liberated, the Party Committee and people of Tan Xuan Commune continued to promote the revolutionary tradition in overcoming the heavy consequences of the war, building a new beautiful life on the land once bombed by the French and American invaders.
About.biaTuongNiem: Monument house honoring martyrs in the area

History.title: History of the Party Committee of Tan Xuan Commune
History.description: An interactive portal that summarizes the important historical milestones in the development and contributions of the Party Committee and the people of Tan Xuan Commune throughout various periods. From the years of struggle for national independence (1930–1975), the period of building socialism (1975–2000), to the significant achievements in socio-economic development and new rural construction (2000–2020). This page not only acknowledges the contributions of previous generations but also serves as a valuable resource for educating revolutionary traditions, inspiring pride, and fostering a strong development spirit for today's and future generations.

Cultural.title: Ho Chi Minh Cultural Space
Cultural.content: We are honored to introduce the works of President Ho Chi Minh and the works written about Him, about His life, His views, His lifestyle,... that every generation of Vietnamese people should preserve, pass on and learn
